item.title: CVE-2022-1604|2024-08-03T00:10:03.757Z -- unknown -- mailerlite%20%E2%80%93%20signup%20forms%20%28official%29
item.description: The MailerLite WordPress plugin before 1.5.4 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
